summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by changing the Ministry Auxiliaries grid item title to “Armor Bearers” on Get Involved. REQ-2 is partially addressed by updating the ministry image catalog to reference new modern assets under /assets/generated, but the diff does not show the required static image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated nor confirms the Ministries page is actually rendering the updated catalog.

missing_requirements.requirement: No visible occurrences of “Alter Bearers” or “Altar Bearers” remain on the Get Involved page.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows one item title changed to “Armor Bearers”, but the GetInvolvedPage.tsx content is truncated, so it cannot be confirmed that there are no remaining occurrences elsewhere on the page.

missing_requirements.requirement: New images are stored as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced from the frontend (not served via the backend).
missing_requirements.reason: The catalog now references /assets/generated/*.png, but the diff shows no added image files and no changes under frontend/public/assets/generated; therefore the required assets being present in that directory is not evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: The images shown in the Ministries page “Ministry Seals” section use newly generated, modern-looking assets (not the prior dated-looking images).
missing_requirements.reason: Only the catalog file was modified; the diff does not show changes in the Ministries page to ensure it uses this updated catalog, and the Ministries page file itself is not included as a modified file in the diff summary.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions MinistriesPage but not that it was modified in this diff)
